https://tmrev.io/movie/51823-Across the Line: The Exodus of Charlie Wright 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wICNztMLSZjTPEYGuNX95loPJXg.jpg The story centers on Charlie, a Los Angeles billionaire financial whiz who goes into self-imposed exile in Tijuana after his empire is revealed to have been a Ponzi scheme. While looking for the woman he abandoned there 25 years before, Charlie is pursued by a Mexican gangster, a federal agent and thugs sent by a former client looking to retrieve his money. Across the Line: The Exodus of Charlie Wright
